enb_long_title: Fortieth session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-40)
section_title: REPORT ON THE ACTIVITIES OF THE IPCC EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE
sentences: Chair Pachauri reported on the monthly activities of the IPCC Executive Committee, noting that it followed the recommendations of the IAC, which had seen value in the previous Executive Team and had recommended establishing an Executive Committee, which would submit reports on the details of its discussions to the Panel.
